participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, enjoys crafting and caring for others.
participant_1.background: I have to be careful not to eat too many gummy worms or I'll get sick. ke ha is my favorite singer of all time. I created a mobile with cute animals to hang above my baby's crib. I spend way too much time on my phone in the morning. I make and me by waiting tables.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Hands-on and artistic, loves building and creating with technology.
participant_2.background: I watch highlights of basketball games on my phone while I eat breakfast. I think it's really cool to be able to build things with your own hands. my favorite band is up. I get to drive around all day while listening to my favorite country music. Others will be impressed by my video editing skills.

content.text: Watching basketball highlights while I eat breakfast. How about you?
I'm making a mobile for my baby's crib. It's going to have cute animals hanging from it.
That's cool! I wish I could be crafty like that. Do you have any other hobbies?
Not really. I just wait tables and spend way too much time on my phone.
I also like video editing. I'm pretty good at it.
That's a really cool skill! What kind of things do you edit?
Mostly music videos and short films. I also do some work for my friends who are musicians.
That's awesome! I wish I had more skills.
You're good at making things. I can't do anything like that.
I'm just good at following directions. I'm not that creative.
Thanks! I'm glad we're having this conversation.
Me too. It's nice to talk to someone who understands.
